channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes - Maked but filling in Not completed, 26th October
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road just past the entrance to upper hill farm and into the trees. The potholes has gotten worse and is in the wheel track of this narrow road. The pothole had been maked for filling in. However, and strangely, potholes before and after it have been filled in but this one - has not even though it is directly in the track of vehicles. There are other along this road also marked but not filled. Please can these be filled in.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Whittington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vegetation on central reservation, 24th October
item.description:
This has been reported previously. A traffic hazard, obscuring line of sight etc Previous report has not been actioned apparently due to CBC litter pick. Report this time is simply to remove vegetation which is solely the responsibility of GCC.

item.title: Big puddle, 24th October
item.description:
Big puddle every time it rains along the pathway outside 66 Nine Elms Road. When itâ€™s too much water it runs onto my drive way and floods my garage.

item.title: Pavement subsidence- water not draining, 23rd October
item.description:
The pavement outside of Boots has subsided so when it now rains a very large pool of water is created - see picture. This spot is also the heart of the city centre

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 192 194 High Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Road level to high and water not draining correctly, 23rd October
item.description:
The road has been resurfaced without it being done correctly. Prior to the road being resurfaced it was okay. The issue itâ€™s causing is when it rains heavy excess water off the road is filling up the driveways causing potential threats of flooding. Attention to the road level or drainage is required.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Tewkesbury Road, Down Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The surface of Cowper Road deteriorating, 23rd October
item.description:
Multiple potholes here, filled with water today. I just got soaked by DHL van because parked cars on the other side of the road force them into these potholes. Some over 7.5cm deep

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Princess Elizabeth Way, Cheltenham

item.title: Previous report not fully fixed., 21st October
item.description:
I previously reported overgrown vegetation to the public footpath between Hunters Road and Stoke Road. This has been reported as fixed (ref 11379330) but, as the photo shows, there is a substantial layer of ivy covering the still covering the footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 19 Hunters Road, Bishops Cleeve

item.title: Potentially dangerous wobbly paving stone, 21st October
item.description:
There are a series of cracked paving stones on the pedestrianised area of The Promenade outside House of Fraser but whilst the council appear to have highlighted one broken slab, its the neighbouring one - that is very wobbly and sticking up - which is potentially dangerous. I have enclosed the window from HOF for reference and proximity

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 48a Regent Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding - Drainage Issues, 21st October
